title: Camera Level Hot Shoe Level Hot Shoe Cover Flashlight Bubble Level Protector for Sony A6000 A6300 Canon Nikon Panasonic Fujifilm Olympus Pentax Sigma Camera DSLR -Pack of 4
feature: UNIVERAL HOT SHOE LEVEL-It will fit any camera that has a standard hot shoe for external flash attachments like Sony A6000 Nikon D5 D200 D300 D500 D810 D610 D700 D750 D810 D800 D800E D5000 D5600 D5500 D5300 D600 D610 D7200 D7100 D3400 D3300 D3200 D5200 D5100 D7000 D60 D80 D90 D600 Coolpix P7800 8800 Canon EOS Rebel T3 Canon t5 Olympus C7070 Fuji X100
KEEP YOUR HOT SHOE CLEAN- Protect your hot shoe from getting bent or damaged when you dont have a flash, mic, or LED light attached, help to keep moisture and dust from the hot shoe

HOT SHOE BUBBLE LEVEL- It comes with the bubble spirit level on the hot shoe protector, You can easily see whether the bubble is centered,you could have a precise horizontal measurement at anytime,bubble spirit level will help the photographer achieve a finer degree of accuracy in capturing image content
LIGHTWEIGHT AND HANDY-The hot shoe level is made of soft rubber,it will not crack when you drop it
